title: Implement INV-003-CAPA-3 and CAPA-4: Audit Trail and Execution Phase Tracking

comment: PRE-REVIEW COMPLETE. DOCUMENT COMPLIANT. Verified: (1) Frontmatter - title present: 'Implement INV-003-CAPA-3 and CAPA-4: Audit Trail and Execution Phase Tracking'. revision_summary N/A for v0.1 per SOP-001 Section 5.1. (2) All required CR sections present per SOP-002 Section 6. (3) No placeholder content (TBD/TODO/FIXME) found. (4) References validated - INV-003 exists and defines CAPA-3 (Finding 4.4) and CAPA-4 (Finding 4.5); SOP-001/002/004 confirmed effective. (5) Technical accuracy verified - implementation plan aligns with INV-003 corrective actions. execution_phase values (pre_release/post_release) improve upon INV-003 proposal (pre/post) with clearer naming. (6) Execution table complete with 10 items, proper PENDING status. Recommend approval routing.

POST-REVIEW COMPLETE. ALL EXECUTION ITEMS VERIFIED. (1) EI-1: log_status_change() confirmed at qms_audit.py:297-311. (2) EI-2: Found 8 calls to log_status_change() in qms.py (lines 1157, 1455, 1564, 1592, 1607, 1704, 1786, 1941). (3) EI-3/EI-4: execution_phase field added to create_initial_meta() at qms_meta.py:105 with correct conditional (pre_release if executable else None). (4) EI-5: cmd_release() sets execution_phase to post_release at qms.py:1791. (5) EI-6/EI-7: checkout/checkin preserve execution_phase (verified in qms_meta.py). (6) EI-8: cmd_route() uses execution_phase for pre/post workflow determination at qms.py:1069-1129. (7) EI-9/EI-10: This CR audit trail shows STATUS_CHANGE events and correct IN_EXECUTION->IN_POST_REVIEW routing, demonstrating both CAPAs working. SCOPE REFINEMENT: Addition of qms_meta.py to scope is technically appropriate - metadata operations belong in that module. NO SCOPE CREEP. Recommend post-approval routing.
